newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Health Systems Design cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Health Systems Design cut.

text.p: --Vector Securities analyst Benjamin Rooks said he lowered his rating on Health Systems Design Corp to neutral from buy.
--Shares in the health information systems (HIS) management company were up 1 to 9.

--"HSDC has unfortunately joined the ranks of at least five other HIS companies that have disappointed on quarterly results. We continue to see this company as offering superior technology, strong managed care competence and a tiered product line ... However, until HSDC can demonstrate that it can execute large deals and consistently meet expectations, we see a risk profile unbecoming of our buy rating," Rooks said.
